Posts.Content: Mar 4, 2009 02:36PM kayhawk wrote: Hi there, I had my simulation/planning session today and got the three dots.  Am wondering about deodorants, creams, etc. that I can use while getting radiation.  My understanding is that I can't use anythiing but I've read about others who talk about the creams and stuff that you can use.  And, did I hear them right that I can't shave under my arm while I'm doing this?  Can anybody help?
Posts.Title: February 2009 rads group - all aboard!! Lories sobx
